EmailTemplate.description: Email template for street closures who want to pay by check
EmailTemplate.name: Street Closures Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Submitting a Request with SFMTA: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your application with SFMTA. We will be reviewing your application to make sure you have all necessary documents attached. You can view the progress and log back in anytime using the following link: {!Case.Link}
You have submitted your application {!Case.Lead_Time_in_Days__c} days before the date of your requested closure. Your fee for this application therefore is {!Case.Net_Due__c}. Once you have made a payment via check, SFMTA will begin processing your application.
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
